login.url_error_message: URL needs to start with http or https.
login.login_subtitle: Log in to any user account

server.server_url_hint: Server URL requires http or https

home.noInternetMessage:
No worries, you can still watch
downloaded content.
home.errorMessage:
Something went wrong.
Please log out and in again.

settings.forward_skip_length_hint: Choose length in seconds when skipping in video playback.
settings.rewind_length_hint: Choose length in seconds when skipping in video playback.
settings.auto_rotate_hint: Important on android since the video player orientation is locked to the app orientation.
settings.video_orientation_hint: Set the full screen video player orientation.
settings.use_external_player_hint: Open all videos in VLC instead of the default player. This requries VLC to be installed on the phone.
settings.no_collections_found: No collections found. Add some in Jellyfin.
settings.force_direct_play_hint: This will always request direct play. This is good if you want to try to stream movies you think the device supports.
settings.device_profile_hint: A profile used for deciding what audio and video codecs the device supports.
settings.search_engine_hint: Choose the search engine you want to use.
